tool_description:
FaceHub - Smart Face Swap:

Introducing FaceHub, your go-to for easy face swapping with AI magic!

This clever technology takes faces from one picture and smoothly puts them into another. It's like a cool face switcher with superpowers.

FaceHub knows all about faces and swaps them effortlessly. Just remember, it works best with one face in each image, and the pictures should be clear.

You can use FaceHub to have fun with social media filters, add excitement to entertainment apps, or create ...
name: FaceHub - AI Face Swap
title: FaceHub - AI Face Swap

api_list.name: swap
api_list.description: provide image url or base64 in source and target image
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://facehub-ai-face-swap.p.rapidapi.com/swap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facehub-ai-face-swap.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://facehub-ai-face-swap.p.rapidapi.com/swap"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "facehub-ai-face-swap.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
